name: Rough Diamond
description:
Created for the PyxlHaus 2018 Gamejam from Monday 11th June 8:00AM GMT to 16th June 9:00 GMT (approx). 

Theme: "Classic with a twist" 

My take was to mash a game classic (Uridium 2) amd a show/anime classic (Tenchi Muyo), and combine them along with a twist (Bullet Hell). 

Story:

The Geodus space pirate Tanzan, pilot of the Rough Diamond, has tasked it upon herself to loot and pillage every Treantal warship she can get her shots through. But the Treantal fleet won't let her have her way so easily...each ship is armed with its own style of weaponry as well as capable of calling upon its own fleet to defend their treasure to the grave. Lock and load, this is gonna be a bumpy ride...

Controls:

(All controls are rebindable in the Unity launcher)

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Left Mouse/Left Ctrl - Shoot

Right Mouse/Left Alt - Bomb (Also activated automatically as self-defense if available)

Menu is currently only navigate-able with mouse controls.
